verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had finished שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And it came to pass when Solomon לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> the building אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵ֣שֶׁק <S%H2837><s%> desire שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> and all Solomon's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָפֵ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> which he was pleased לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do פ

וַיֵּרָ֧א <S%H7200><s%> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> That the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon שֵׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> the second time כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> he נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> as he had appeared אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1391><s%> unto him at Gibeon

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him שָׁ֠מַעְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> unto him I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּפִלָּתְךָ֣ <S%H8605><s%> thy prayer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּחִנָּתְךָ֮ <S%H8467><s%> and thy supplication אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִתְחַנַּ֣נְתָּה <S%H2603><s%> that thou hast made לְפָנַי֒ <S%H6440><s%> before הִקְדַּ֗שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> me I have hallowed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנִ֔תָה <S%H1129><s%> which thou hast built לָשֽׂוּם־ <S%H7760><s%> to put שְׁמִ֥י <S%H8034><s%> my name שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> there for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵינַ֧י <S%H5869><s%> and mine eyes וְלִבִּ֛י <S%H3820><s%> and mine heart שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> will be there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall be there הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> shall be there perpetually

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked לְפָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after הָלַ֜ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> me as David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father בְּתָם־ <S%H8537><s%> in integrity לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> of heart וּבְיֹ֔שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> and in uprightness לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּיתִ֑יךָ <S%H6680><s%> according to all that I have commanded חֻקַּ֥י <S%H2706><s%> my statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> and my judgments תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> thee [and] wilt keep

וַהֲקִ֨מֹתִ֜י <S%H6965><s%> Then I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסֵּ֧א <S%H3678><s%> the throne מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4467><s%> of thy kingdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel לְעֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> as I promised עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> to David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> There shall not fail לְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee a man מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שׁ֨וֹב <S%H7725><s%> [But] if ye shall at all תְּשֻׁב֜וּן <S%H7725><s%> turn אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> me ye or your children מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> from following וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> and will not keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments חֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> [and] my statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <S%H1980><s%> you but go וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7812><s%> and worship לָהֶֽם׃

וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <S%H3772><s%> Then will I cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מֵעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> of פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> out הָאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> them and this house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> which I have hallowed לִשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> for my name אֲשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> will I cast out מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> of פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> of my sight וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> will become יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel לְמָשָׁ֥ל <S%H4912><s%> shall be a proverb וְלִשְׁנִינָ֖ה <S%H8148><s%> and a byword בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> among all people

וְהַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> And at this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> and this יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become עֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> [which] is high כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that passeth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> by יִשֹּׁ֣ם <S%H8074><s%> by it shall be astonished וְשָׁרָ֑ק <S%H8319><s%> and shall hiss וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֨ה <S%H4100><s%> how long עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> done יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Why hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thus unto this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְלַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> house הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they shall answer עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who עָזְב֜וּ <S%H5800><s%> Because they forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> their God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> who brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֹתָם֮ <S%H1><s%> their fathers מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַֽיַּחֲזִ֙קוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> and have taken hold בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> upon other [וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> bow down ק) לָהֶ֖ם וַיַּעַבְדֻ֑ם <S%H5647><s%> them and served עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> brought יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> them therefore hath the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> upon them all this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> And it came to pass at the end עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> of twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> when Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הַבָּתִּ֑ים <S%H1004><s%> houses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's

חִירָ֣ם <S%H2438><s%> ([Now] Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king צֹ֠ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre נִשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> had furnished אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בַּעֲצֵי֩ <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֨ים <S%H730><s%> with cedar וּבַעֲצֵ֧י <S%H6086><s%> trees בְרוֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H1265><s%> and fir וּבַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and with gold לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all חֶפְצ֑וֹ <S%H2656><s%> acceptable אָ֡ז <S%H227><s%> for יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> gave הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְחִירָם֙ <S%H2438><s%> Hiram עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty עִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַגָּלִֽיל׃ <S%H1551><s%> of Galilee

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> came out חִירָם֙ <S%H2438><s%> And Hiram מִצֹּ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> from Tyre לִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> had given ל֖וֹ שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> which Solomon וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָשְׁר֖וּ <S%H3474><s%> direct בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> What הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> What cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> [are] these which thou hast given לִּ֖י אָחִ֑י <S%H251><s%> another וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> bewray לָהֶם֙ אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them the land כָּב֔וּל <S%H3521><s%> of Cabul עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent חִירָ֖ם <S%H2438><s%> And Hiram לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

וְזֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> now this דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the reason הַמַּ֜ס <S%H4522><s%> of the levy אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֶעֱלָ֣ה ׀ <S%H5927><s%> raised הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לִבְנוֹת֩ <S%H1129><s%> for to build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> and his own house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּלּ֔וֹא <S%H4407><s%> and Millo וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> and the wall יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָצֹ֥ר <S%H2674><s%> and Hazor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְגִדּ֖וֹ <S%H4023><s%> and Megiddo וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּֽזֶר׃ <S%H1507><s%> and Gezer

פַּרְעֹ֨ה <S%H6547><s%> [For] Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עָלָ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> had gone up וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> and taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֶּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H1507><s%> Gezer וַיִּשְׂרְפָ֣הּ <S%H8313><s%> and burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> it with fire וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בָּעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city הָרָ֑ג <S%H2026><s%> and slain וַֽיִּתְּנָהּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> and given שִׁלֻּחִ֔ים <S%H7964><s%> it [for] a present לְבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> unto his daughter אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon's

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּ֔זֶר <S%H1507><s%> Gezer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית חֹרֹ֖ן <S%H1032><s%> and Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <S%H8481><s%> the nether

וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּעֲלָ֛ת <S%H1191><s%> And Baalath וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [תָּמָר כ] (תַּדְמֹ֥ר <S%H8412><s%> continually ק) בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land
